text: Abtolemus (, Avtolemus; Greek: Εὔτολμος) was a Tanna of the third Generation. Jose ben Halafta was his disciple. He is quoted several times as attesting to a halacha on the authority of "Five Elders".Mishna Eruvin 3:4; Eruvin 35a, Rosh Hashana 15a Some identify him with Abtolemus b. Reuben, who is cited in the Talmud: ==References== Category:Mishnah rabbis Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Abtolemus
